MajorClaims.MC1: one can also shine without even having to attend universities
MajorClaims.MC2: it would be wrong to say that one's success completely depends on the education he or she receives at the institutions

Claims.C1: it is indeed true that university education is pivotal in a person's life in order for one to prosper
Claims.C2: it is certainly true that university education is of paramount importance for certain professions such as doctor, engineer and lawyer
Claims.C3: there are also a significant number of people who are very successful in their fields without going to university
Claims.C4: individuals born with talents have also a high chance to be successful

Premises.P1: Without proper training and knowledge, it would be impossible for them to perform their best in their careers
Premises.P2: Not only that, when they are in a university, they will have the opportunity to share their knowledge as well as to network for business associates and partners
Premises.P3: This can benefit them in future when they intend to open up their own companies or hospitals
Premises.P4: Take for instance those who start their own business
Premises.P5: These people depend solely on hard work and luck
Premises.P6: for some of them it proved to be a profitable job
Premises.P7: Michael Dell who is the founder and the CEO of Dell left college at 19
Premises.P8: he started his computer company in his college dorm room
Premises.P9: he used his earnings as well as his family's loan in order to progress to be who he is now
Premises.P10: people with natural talents are also most likely to excel in their life
Premises.P11: This is especially true in sectors like entertainment and sports
Premises.P12: The introduction of increasing number of reality shows have made it possible for all those lucky ones to triumph
Premises.P13: David Archuleta who was once a nobody has now taken up a large space in hearts of many
